headline: GTA Online
subtitle: On the Podium This Week: HVY Nightshark
content: Stop by the lobby of The Diamond Casino & Resort and give the Lucky Wheel a spin to walk away with GTA$, RP, clothing, and other assorted mystery prizes. This week on the podium is the HVY Nightshark, an armored SUV built to withstand an onslaught of rockets, bullets, and whatever else life throws at you.
